attributes.action: Bring back toys in cereal boxes. Children are being denied enjoyment.
attributes.background: As a child I spent many a morning trying to retrieve the "in" toy or cereal box collectable from many a box of cereal, nervously before my parents or sister could catch me elbow deep in a cereal box. ( Normally Frosties ) I would love for my children to experience this joy and excitement in life.

rejection.details: You could write to cereal manufacturers to make this suggestion.
